Title: Feast or Flaming
Description:
Already Fyrakk damages the fabric of the Dream. I can feel it burning, as if flames were consuming my scales.

And I know that simmering agony is only a fraction of what my son felt when Fyrakk tormented him. 

But we have a potent weapon against this fire. Our faerie drakes and dragons consume what does not belong here. They are excellent allies, if a bit difficult to manage.

Now they need our help. Use this. Clear the skies of encroaching flame.
ObjectivesText: Dragonride or ride the Faerie Drake to consume fiery patches in the Dream.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Cenarius by the Shallow Crossing in the Emerald Dream.

Objectives.Text: Summon Your Dragonriding Mount or Mount Faerie Drake
